show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
This week’s Project Censored Show is from our JFK special. This hour we air our interview with Mark Lane.

This week on the Project Censored Show on Pacifica Radio, Peter Phillips and Mickey Huff recently interviewed Mark Lane as part of their four hour JFK anniversary special.
We air that interview in our hourly spot this week.
Mark Lane is an attorney and a leading researcher/author on the assassination of President Kennedy.
From his 1966 bestselling critique of the Warren Commission, Rush to Judgment, and later work Plausible Denial, to Last Word: My Indictment of the CIA in the Murder of JFK, Lane is noted as a key expert in matters regarding the JFK assassination and subsequent government cover-up.
